bug.author: zchrissirhcz
bug.summary: tutorial.py crash with CARLA 0.9.10.1 on ubuntu 16.04
bug.description: Hi, CARLA Team I'm using ubuntu 16.04 and running CARLA 0.9.10.1, tested with both vulkan and opengl render backend. When I run tutorial.py it just crash for both cases. The output: (base) Monster% python tutorial.py created vehicle.mercedes-benz.coupe created sensor.camera.depth vehicle location is: Location(x=-24.308105, y=-135.292221, z=0.128924) created vehicle.gazelle.omafiets created vehicle.gazelle.omafiets created vehicle.harley-davidson.low_rider created vehicle.harley-davidson.low_rider created vehicle.bh.crossbike terminate called after throwing an instance of 'std::out_of_range' what(): _Map_base::at

comments.comment: Hi, Thanks for pointing this out, we will be looking into this issue and solve it!
